CustomField.formula: IF ( OR (ISPICKVAL(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c , "Accounting Firm"), ISPICKVAL(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c , "Strategic Accountant Firm")) ,IF (BLANKVALUE( MutualClients__c ,0) < 1, 1 , IF (MutualClients__c < 5, 5-MutualClients__c , IF (MutualClients__c < 20, 20-MutualClients__c, NULL))) , NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How many clients are needed to reach the next tier?
CustomField.label: Additional Clients Needed For Next Tier
